DOC.brief_title: Patient International Normalised Ratio ( INR ) Self-Testing Program
DOC.detailed_description: This first French , prospective , randomise , single centre study , compare patient self-testing ( PST ) international normalise ratio ( INR ) , conventional laboratory monitoring . Aims study prove correlation laboratory PST measurement , estimation INR variability within target therapeutic zone frequency hemorrhagic and/or thromboembolic event mechanical heart valve replacement . Patients ( 206 ) postoperatively , randomly , consecutively include ( 2004 - 2008 ) : 103 patient group , one year follow-up . Two INR control device select : Coaguchek® ( Roche ) INRATIO® ( Hemosense ) .
